article_title: Five epic PR blunders  and what they taught us
article_text:

Posted Sep. 28, 2014 at 12:01 AM

article_metadata.description: The old adage any publicity is good publicity is often trotted out when a business faces bad PR. In reality, however, the effects of bad publicity can be devastating.
